properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-17.72N 049-39.52W AND 05-14.48N 050-34.53W.
   B. 06 OCT ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-14.18N 049-35.42W AND 05-11.40N 050-30.07W.
   C. 07 OCT ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-10.63N 049-31.33W AND 05-08.30N 050-25.60W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 08 OCT 12.
